summary: REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3 appear implemented on the Account Status page via admin-only conditional rendering for Troubleshooting and Publishing & Deployment, and a role-based subtitle. REQ-4 (platform publish of Draft v53 to live and producing a live link) is not evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform the platform publishing step to publish the currently deployed Draft Version 53 to live/production after applying the agreed UI changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows code/documentation changes; it does not show evidence of an actual platform publish operation completing, nor a produced live/production link.
evidence: File diff summary: no entries indicating a publish operation or generated live link
